examples: The thought of being left alone filled her with horror.
La idea de quedarse sola la llenaba de horror.
People watched in horror as the plane crashed to the ground.
La gente vio con horror cómo el avión se estrellaba contra el suelo.
She realized with horror that somebody had broken into her house.
Se dio cuenta con horror de que alguien había irrumpido en su casa.
To his horror, he realized that he couldn't escape (= it upset him very much).
Para su horror, se dio cuenta de que no podía escapar (= le disgustó mucho).
